title: Episode 110: Narcissism Among Celebrities, on Facebook and in Shakespeare
description: Are celebrities really more narcissistic than you are?  Is your Facebook page telling the world that you are a narcissist? And finally: who is Shakespeare's most narcissistic character?  I'll give you a hint: the character can be found in Twelfth Night.  In this episode of The Psych Files I look at the concept of narcissism and how you can see it in everyday life.
